p: Seven representative population groups of Cura√ßao were selected to participate in FGDs (n = 50 participants)[ 39]. The following groups were included; (I) residents born in the Netherlands; (II) local youth; (III) interviewers of the survey; (IV-VII) individuals from the neighbourhoods of Rooi Santu, Seru Fortuna, Souax and Koraalspecht)( S1 Table). The neighbourhoods Rooi Santu, Seru Fortuna, Souax and Koraalspecht comprise individuals of all socio-economic statuses. FGDs with the interviewers of the survey and residents born in the Netherlands were used as comparison groups. An FGD with the local youth was conducted to compare the experiences and perceptions of the local youth with adults. The IDIs were conducted among twenty adults with laboratory-confirmed CHIKV infection. The number of FGDs and IDIs needed in the study was determined after data saturation had been reached [ 44]. Study subjects for qualitative research were recruited using the snowball recruitment technique, key informants, and via community centres [ 39].
